subject: College Athletics
Football
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: While Ohio State President E. Gordon Gee admits mistakes in the university’s handling of Jim Tressel’s scandal, he says school officials never attempted to skirt N.C.A.A. rules.
snippet: While Ohio State President E. Gordon Gee admits mistakes in the university’s handling of Jim Tressel’s scandal, he says school officials never attempted to skirt N.C.A.A. rules.
